title: Google\Cloud\Video\LiveStream\V1\Input\SecurityRule
name: SecurityRule
description:
Security rules for access control. Each field represents one security rule.

Only when the source of the input stream satisfies all the fields, this input stream can be accepted.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.Input.SecurityRule

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.ip_ranges
params.description: At least one ip range must match unless none specified. The IP range is defined by CIDR block: for example, 192.0.1.0/24 for a range and 192.0.1.0/32 for a single IP address.
